official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the Government's health insurance program for Federal employees include benefits relating to cleft lip, cleft palate, and certain other conditions.

summary.text: Provides that Federal health benefits plans may include benefits relating to cleft lip, cleft palate, and other congenital craniofacial anomalies.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the Government's health insurance program for Federal employees include benefits relating to cleft lip, cleft palate, and certain other conditions.
